error.no_url_available: URL is required since you have not configured an external URL in Home Assistant

data_description.api_key: The API token of your bot.

data_description.proxy_url:
Proxy URL if working behind one, optionally including username and password.
({socks_url})

data_description.api_key: The API token of your bot.

user.description:
To create a Telegram bot, follow these steps:

1. Open Telegram and start a chat with [{botfather_username}]({botfather_url}).
1. Send the command `/newbot`.
1. Follow the instructions to create your bot and get your API token.

data_description.proxy_url:
Proxy URL if working behind one, optionally including username and password.
({socks_url})

data_description.trusted_networks:
Telegram server access ACL as list.
Default: 149.154.160.0/20, 91.108.4.0/22
data_description.url: Allow to overwrite the external URL from the Home Assistant configuration for different setups.

data_description.chat_id: ID representing the user or group chat to which messages can be sent.

allowlist_external_dirs_error.message: File path has not been configured in allowlist_external_dirs.

failed_chat_ids.message: Failed targets: {chat_ids}. Please verify that the chat IDs for {bot_name} have been configured.

invalid_chat_ids.message: Invalid chat IDs: {chat_ids}. Please configure the chat IDs for {bot_name}.

invalid_inline_keyboard.message: Invalid value for inline keyboard. Only strings or lists are accepted.

missing_allowed_chat_ids.message: No allowed chat IDs found. Please add allowed chat IDs for {bot_name}.

missing_config_entry.message: No config entries found or setup failed. Please set up the Telegram Bot first.

multiple_config_entry.message: Multiple config entries found. Please specify the Telegram bot to use in the Config entry ID field.

deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
deprecated_yaml.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration is being removed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_error.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an error while importing your existing configuration ({telegram_bot}): {error_message}.
Setup will not proceed.

Verify that your {telegram_bot} is operating correctly and restart Home Assistant to attempt the import again.

Alternatively, you may remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml entirely, restart Home Assistant, and add the {integration_title} integration manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_error.title: YAML import failed due to invalid {error_field}

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_has_more_pl.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed.

The last entry of your existing YAML configuration ({telegram_bot}) has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue. The other Telegram bots will need to be configured manually in the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_has_more_pl.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration is being removed
